title: Bug 122105 - Schema not included in stored procedure naming
description: When using a stored procedure, the schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' in the QueryText field.
OB: In the 'Edit data set' window, when I drag a stored procedure to the QueryText field, the stored procedure naming does not include the database schema name and only shows the stored procedure name.
EB: I expect that when I drag a stored procedure to the QueryText field, the stored procedure naming should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name in the format 'schemaname.Procedurename'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the 'Edit data set' window.
2. Drag a stored procedure to the QueryText field.
